name: helping-hand
effect: Boosts the power of the target’s moves by 50% until the end of this turn. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
short_effect: Ally’s next move inflicts half more damage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Boosts the power of the recipient’s moves.
flavor_text.emerald: Boosts the power of the recipient’s moves.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A move that boosts the power of the ally’s attack in a battle.
